other_tests.findings: Negative for C. psittaci IgG and slightly positive for IgM (titer, 1:20).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Documented C. psittaci seroconversion confirming diagnosis of professional acquisition of psittacosis.

other_tests.findings: Initially positive for MDR K. pneumoniae, but became sterile after 4 weeks of tigecycline therapy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sequential sternum samples became sterile, but MDR K. pneumoniae was still recovered from adipose and subcutaneous tissues.
